richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2apF195QzVB5lWkDYHANjU","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This past month 100 care packages to the Toronto Family Residence were donated in Scarborough! A special thanks to Romina Boodram, who led the Hygeine to Better Health campaign, and Tiffany Bishun, our BTO event director who led this donation initiative.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Each care package included two bars of soap, a toothbrush and a toothpaste tube. Hygiene To Better Health's campaign funded BTO's care packages, making this initiative possible.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you would like to help with our future donations, keep an eye out for our Tote Bag Competition fundraiser that is coming up soon!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

references.description: 100 care packages were donated to the Toronto Family Residence!
references.title: Donation Recap
